title: Evolution Stone Craft logo font
content:
Can anyone out there identify the font used in this logo? I need to use it in a brochure and they only have a really poor quality jpeg available. THANK YOU FONT MASTERS. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015222356/http:/typophile.com/files/%20.jpg) | 120.62 KB |
author: amyjne

comments.content:
Not sure what happened here but that is obviously the wrong image. :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015222356im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Evolution_StoneCraft_5902.jpg)
but the size and resolution was much better.
Hahaha! That it was! Thank you so much! I was spinning my wheels forever with that one. :)

[Stone range hoods](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015222356/http:/southernstonecrafters.com/range-hoods/) The first time I came here, less than 10 seconds the display is perfectly open, and the loading is completed less than 20 seconds and to open the article only took about 7 seconds. So I think this is very fast! Incredible! Trying to maintain!
